page.title: 01THE GENERAL SURVEY 1
page.content: {TRANSPORT}-The motorway runs from North to South in the Western region of the area.The motorway island has five major turnings off it.Most of the roads in the area are B roads apart from the motorway.The canal runs around the North Western area.The railway runs almost parallel with the motorway on the Eastern side. {LANDSCAPE}-It is rural landscape, scattered with farms and one village of about 700 people.The land is rolling,but there is a steep wooded ridge running from North to South in the West of the area.This reaches 79-80m .There seems to have been very little building in the area. {AGRICULTURE}-The land is used for dairy pasture and cereals, with some sheep. Most the land was green because of growing and ripening crops.
